sn10.11:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10.11:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako cīrāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ adāsi.
sn10.11:4.4: Atha kho cīrāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn10.11:5.4: Sabbayogehi vippamuttiyā”ti.
